TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET SHORTAGE FORECAST REVISED DOWN
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it revised its forecast of the shortage in the money market down to around 700 mln stg from its original estimate of 800 mln. REUTER
